attributes.action: No voluteering for sharia law in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The muslims should not be allowed to volunteer for sharia law. This is a great problem for Europe. 

Women and children are  being oppressed and this needs to be stopped.

I feel that alot needs to be changed in the united kingdom. The muslims are taking over.

This is discriminating the british people who want one law for all. Equal rights have to be heard and not swept under the carpet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
